title: ISic000620. I.Sicily inscription 000620
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]BETILIE[...---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Manganaro and photographs

translation

commentary

Orsi in NSA reports the dimensions of all four blocks: (a), reading TIL, is 1.2 x 0.6 x 0.25m; (b) reading E is 0.45 x 0.6 x 0.37; (c) reading IE is 0.48 x 0.6 x 0.31; (d) reading B is 0.85 x 0.6 x 0.2.

bibliography

  • Orsi 1899 385 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • 1989.0342i
  • Gentili 1973 69 fig.66
  • Wilson 1980 2217-2218, 2230 tav.2.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002581
  • Manganaro 1988 55 n.273 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
  • Wilson 1990 40 n.68, 82 n.167 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001509
  • Manganaro 1989 183-184 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001831
  • Orsi 2018 248, Tacc.4 p.44 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002617
